column5: Some awesome fishing at V-Beach! Hubby used a "Silver/blue Williams Warbler" as a flasher to bring perch in....And caught the biggest Damn Perch I have ever seen! Caught this about noon today, weighed 10 pounds and was 33 inches long.....   Oh and I thought I would put a plug in for Penny at D C Marina in Keswick...Talk to her today and she is trying really hard to get a permit so she can have a portable bait shop on the ice.....Application is in MNR......She really misses you guys! Doug is still repairing snowmobiles and atv's , give em a call! they would be glad to hear from you  Lorissa
That's a very respectable pike at any time.   Congrats.
Very Nice catch !!!!!.  .thats a great way to kick off the season....cheers
Nice first catch of the season  Joey
If there's one thing I've learned in my life, it's women are always right.   If she says it's a perch... it's a perch.  And a nice one too!
Its a pike and thats a man
